name: Hook Man - Super Jump Sport
description:
Hook Man did it again. No seriously.. just look where we put him. He is trying to escape using just his spider skills and we gave him only the rope.
That's where you come in - Swing like a ninja through the world and help him beat all the levels by swinging him on all solid places you can find and don't hit the spikes!!

Master the game and become the swing stick hero!
